title: Verses Occasioned interpretation of last stanza

content.prompt: Which interpretation of the last stanza (lines 21-32) is most fully supported by the speaker’s statements and use of imagery?

choices.label: A person’s relationships late in life provide greater warmth.
A person’s first love leaves a stronger impression than all others.
People remember their first experience of love with satisfaction.
People tend to recall the first person they love as a fantastic creature.

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
